scripts.dev: echo '🚀 ZION 2.8.1 TestNet Dashboard Awakening...' && echo '⚡ Production Server: 91.98.122.165 - All Services Ready! ⚡' && next dev -p 3007
scripts.build: echo '🌌 ZION 2.8.1 Production Build Ceremony...' && next build && echo '✨ ZION 2.8.1 TestNet Frontend Build Complete! ✨'
scripts.start: echo '🚀 ZION 2.8.1 Production Portal Opening...' && next start -p 3007
scripts.lint: echo '🎯 ZION 2.8.1 Code Quality Validation...' && next lint
scripts.dev-blessing: echo '🌟 ZION 2.8.1 TestNet Development Session!' && ../scripts/cosmic-dev-blessing.sh && npm run dev
scripts.production: echo '🏭 ZION 2.8.1 TestNet Production Deployment...' && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.warp-test: echo '🔥 Testing WARP Bridge Integration...' && npm run build && npm run start
